actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Regulation and Conservation

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission from issuing a permit or license for certain facilities to be located at Lake Tuscaloosa, Alabama.

summary.text: Lake Tuscaloosa Preservation Act - Prohibits the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission from issuing any permit, license, or exemption for hydroelectric power project facilities located on Lake Tuscaloosa, Alabama.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission from issuing a permit or license for certain facilities to be located at Lake Tuscaloosa, Alabama.
